description: Welcome to 318 Ber Creek Dr, a beautifully maintained and thoughtfully designed single-family home in the heart of Fuquay-Varina. This spacious residence offers 4 bedrooms and 3 full bathrooms , blending comfort with modern convenience.     Step inside to discover a flexible floor plan featuring a main-level bedroom,  ideal for guests or multigenerational living, and expansive living areas filled with natural light. The well-appointed kitchen flows seamlessly into the dining and family spaces perfect for everyday living and entertaining alike.     Upstairs, retreat to generous bedrooms and additional living space, offering privacy and comfort for everyone in the household. The home includes a 2-car attached garage,  central­-air conditioning, and practical interior amenities that enhance everyday living.     Situated in a desirable community with easy access to Highway 55 and Highway 540, you're just minutes from downtown Holly Springs and Fuquay-Varina downtown, plus shops, dining, and local amenities. The fully fenced backyard provides a private outdoor space for relaxing, play, and entertaining.     Experience comfort, location, and lifestyle at 318 Ber Creek Dr.  --a  wonderful place to call home.

title: 97 Schnoor Road
photos: imgs/Single/img-1.png
imgs/Single/img-bed-1.png
imgs/Single/img-wash-1.png
imgs/Single/img-kitchen-1.png
description:
Beautifully updated 1,800 sq. ft. four-bedroom Colonial set on a private 3.3-acre lot with an oversized two-car garage. This move-in-ready home features an eat-in kitchen with cherry cabinetry, granite countertops, tile flooring, and new appliances, opening to a comfortable sitting area with a fireplace. Recent improvements include new hardwood floors, updated bathrooms, and a modern heating system.

The outdoor space is a private oasis with a stone patio, mature trees, and plenty of room for a pool. Located in a quiet cul-de-sac neighborhood, just minutes from town center and schools.

Additional features include a finished basement with potential for a home office or gym, a newer roof (2020), and a generator hookup. The property is conveniently situated near major highways for easy commuting, while still offering the tranquility of a countryside setting.

title: 722 Denburn Place
photos: imgs/Properties/prop-1.png
imgs/Properties/prop-2.png
imgs/Properties/prop-3.png
description:
A stunning 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom residence in the heart of Raleigh. This newly renovated home boasts an open-concept living space with modern finishes, a chef's kitchen with stainless steel appliances, and a spacious primary suite with spa-like bathroom. The private backyard retreat features a covered patio perfect for outdoor entertaining.

Located in one of Raleigh's most sought-after neighborhoods with easy access to downtown, top-rated schools, and local amenities.

title: 892 Willow Creek
photos: imgs/Properties/prop-3.png
imgs/Properties/prop-1.png
imgs/Properties/prop-2.png
description:
Rare opportunity to own a sprawling 5-bedroom co-op in the premier Manhattan location. This exceptional residence offers panoramic city views, soaring ceilings, and premium finishes throughout. The gourmet kitchen features top-of-the-line appliances, custom cabinetry, and a large island. The primary suite includes a walk-in closet and luxurious en-suite bathroom.

Building amenities include a full-time doorman, concierge, fitness center, rooftop terrace, and private parking. Walking distance to Central Park, world-class dining, and cultural institutions.

title: 125 Park Avenue
photos: imgs/Properties/prop-1.png
imgs/Properties/prop-2.png
imgs/Properties/prop-3.png
description:
A once-in-a-generation opportunity: the most spectacular penthouse on Park Avenue. This extraordinary 12,000 sq. ft. full-floor residence occupies the entire top floor of the building, offering 360-degree views of Manhattan. With 8 bedrooms, 10 bathrooms, a formal dining room, library, and a private rooftop terrace with a pool, this home is truly one-of-a-kind.

Finished with the finest materials — Venetian plaster walls, herringbone hardwood floors, and custom millwork throughout. Building services include white-glove concierge, private elevator, and 24/7 security.

title: 45 Park Avenue
photos: imgs/Properties/prop-2.png
imgs/Properties/prop-3.png
imgs/Properties/prop-1.png
description:
Charming 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home situated in a desirable Raleigh neighborhood. This well-maintained property features an open floor plan, updated kitchen with granite countertops, hardwood floors, and a beautifully landscaped backyard. The master suite includes a walk-in closet and a renovated bathroom.

Conveniently located near downtown Raleigh, top schools, shopping centers, and parks.

title: 88 Estate Drive
photos: imgs/Properties/prop-3.png
imgs/Properties/prop-1.png
imgs/Properties/prop-2.png
description:
Magnificent 5-bedroom villa situated on a sprawling estate lot in prestigious North Raleigh. This luxury residence features soaring 12-foot ceilings, a grand foyer, gourmet kitchen with butler's pantry, home theater, and wine cellar. The resort-style backyard boasts a heated pool, outdoor kitchen, and manicured gardens.

Built with the finest craftsmanship and materials, this home offers the ultimate in luxury living close to RTP, top-rated schools, and Crabtree Valley Mall.
